channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A double bed mattress on the pavemant, 11th September
item.description:
This Mattress has been dumped on the pavement by the tenants of number 2 Crusoe Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: St Mary cray high street at bus stop, 11th September
item.description:
I have reported this twice before and been told it is Thames Water problem by Bromley Council, Thames water are saying it is local authority problem as photo , someone needs to take responsibility for this , it has been going on for months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 193, High Street, Poverest, Orpington, London

item.description:

item.title: Litter, 11th September
item.description:
The alleyway leading from Froissart Road into Keynsham Gardens (top of Horsfeld Road) is full with litter, its entire length. It has been like this for more than 3 weeks

item.title: Signs & markings needed for zebra crossing, 11th September
item.description:
Issue: As per the SRA Road Safety Working Group proposals already submitted for ‘Pedestrian Crossings’, there is currently no advance warning in Station Rd to let road users know there is a zebra crossing. Requirement: ‘Pedestrian Crossing’ signage and painted ‘SLOW’ road markings are needed on the approaches on either side of the zebra crossing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Mead Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 11th September
item.description:
Noticed today, this new dog fouling. Dog fouling was cleared yesterday, today there is more in the space shown and further along the pavement and along the road going round the corner towards the local shop. Its mixed with leaves, rubbish and stepped in.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cassland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge left by side of house, 11th September
item.description:
Saw a man making noise and then drove off then saw that a fridge has been left by the side of the house Tuesday evening (09/09/25). Kids are pushing onto road making it dangerous for drivers also

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Katherine Gardens, Well Hall, London

item.title: Abandoned Car, 11th September
item.description:
An abandoned car, taking up space very near to a busy junction, opposite a church. Walden Avenue/Elmstead Lane t-junction. Missing two wheels, propped up on unsafe stilts. An accident waiting to happen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Avenue, Elmstead, London

item.title: Flypost, 11th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 319, Croydon Road, Elmers End, London

item.title: Constant Dumping on this street, 11th September
item.description:
Continuous dumping. Nothing ever seems to be done by way of at least putting a sign with fine notifications or else cameras up. Please remove current rubbish (until the next people dump there again). Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyndhurst Way, London

item.title: Huge dump of furniture and existing problem, 11th September
item.description:
